resources.string: Ilul-d Lɛerbi Benmhidi deg Temlilt n useggas n 1923, yeɣra Leqran sakkin yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz n ifransisen maca staxren-t-id sinna, imir-nni iruḥ akked baba-s ar Tbeskert anda yeṭṭef taɣuri ines deg uɣerbaz agla n Tiddukla n Imusnawen Inselmen Idzayriyen. yekcem deg ukabar n weɣlef azzayri, yella deg tameskant n 08 magu 1945, ihi ṭṭfen-t, rran-t ar lḥebs 10 iseggasen. Asmi yettwaṭṭef, ḥekmen fell-as s lmut u nɣant bla ma iɛedda di ccreɛ, deg useggas n 1957.
